questionTitle: Lasers <u><font color='red'>are</font></u> indispensable <u><font color='red'>tools</font></u> <u><font color='red'>for</font></u> delicate <u><font color='red'>eyes</font></u> surgery.

It's an awful ________ your wife couldn't come. I was looking forward to meeting her.
There is a fault at out TV station. Please do not ________ your set.
Don't touch the cat, he may ________ you.
The managers agreed to ________ the question of payment.
Owing to the bad weather, the garden party was ________.

a sabbatical year = ________.
anwers: a year in which one is released from one's normal duties
a year in which previously made plans are bound to
a year that has brought happiness and good fortune

questionTitle: It always ________ me as odd that he should go off to work so late in the day.
